Class Project

java.lang.Object
se.kth.saeedvan.taskmanager.model.Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Project>
public class Project extends Object implements Comparable<Project>, Serializable
This class represents logic and data for a project that contains the list of tasks created by the user.

Handles the tasks and stores them in an internal list for further handling from the user.

Author:
Saeed Kassab, Van Matti
See Also:

    • addTask

      public Task addTask(String description, TaskPrio prio)
      Creates a new task with the given description and priority. The task is added to the list tasks, nextTaskId variable is incremented.
      Parameters:
      description - description of the task
      prio - priority of the task
      Returns:
      the newly created task

    • removeTask

      public boolean removeTask(Task task)
      Removes a given task from this project and removes from the list tasks.
      Parameters:
      task - to be removed
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed the task, otherwise returns false.

    • getState

      public ProjectState getState()
      Returns the state of the project based on the state of its tasks. If there are no tasks, the stat is ProjectState.EMPTY. If all tasks is not TaskState.DONE, the state is ProjectState.ONGOING. If all tasks are TaskState.DONE, the state is ProjectState.COMPLETED.
      Returns:
      the current ProjectState of this project

    • getLastUptaded

      public LocalDate getLastUptaded()
      Returns the LocalDate of the latest updated task in the project. If there are no tasks in the project, then the projects creation date is returned.
      Returns:
      the date of the latest update or the creation date if there are no tasks

    • getTaskById

      public Task getTaskById(int id)
      Returns the searched task by the given id. If the id deosnt match any task id then null is returned.
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:
      Returns the searched task by the given id or null

    • findTasks

      public List<Task> findTasks(ITaskMatcher matcher)
      Finds all the tasks in this project that matches the given criteria. The matching is made by the given ITaskMatcher. The matched tasks are returned in descending order of their id.
      Parameters:
      matcher - criteria used to find the tasks
      Returns:
      a list of tasks that matches the criteria

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Project project)
      Compares title of this project to the given parameter.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Project>
      Parameters:
      project - the object to be compared.
      Returns:
      value 0 if the title match, value not 0 otherwise.
